name: AVAssetTrack.AssociationType
desc: Constants that define track association types.

items.name: static let audioFallback: AVAssetTrack.AssociationType
items.desc: The track contains the same content as another track, but in a more widely supported format.

items.name: static let chapterList: AVAssetTrack.AssociationType
items.desc: The associated track contains chapter information for the base track.

items.name: static let forcedSubtitlesOnly: AVAssetTrack.AssociationType
items.desc: An association between a subtitle track containing forced and nonforced subtitles and one with a subtitle track containing only forced subtitles.

items.name: static let metadataReferent: AVAssetTrack.AssociationType
items.desc: An association between a metadata track and the track that it describes or annotates.

items.name: static let selectionFollower: AVAssetTrack.AssociationType
items.desc: An association between two tracks that specifies when a user selects the main track, the system should follow that selection by automatically selecting the associated track.

items.name: static let timecode: AVAssetTrack.AssociationType
items.desc: An association between a timecode track providing timing information for the main track.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an association type with a string value.
